name: @nodes-links/util-raw-data-common
description: Utility for the Nodes & Links sdk

scripts.pull-origin: git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/nodes-links/util-raw-data-common.git && git fetch && git checkout -f master
scripts.build-and-publish: npm run prepare-out && npm run copy-package-json && cd .\out && npm run pull-origin && cd .. && npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.push-origin: git add . && git commit -m "Add new version" && git push origin master
scripts.publish-and-push-origin: npm run build-and-publish && cd .\out && npm run push-origin
